title: Read and Understand the Problem
text: The question tells us that Jamal rides his bike at the speed of 12 miles per hour which means that every hour he is riding 12 miles.

title: Identify the Unknown
text: We are looking for the total distance traveled and we can name it "d"

title: Translate
text: We can use the formula $$distance=rate time$$ --> $$d=rt$$

title: Substitute
text: Since we are given that the rate is 12 mph and the time is 3.5 hours, we can substitute $$r=12$$, $$t=3.5$$ and get $$d=12\times3.5$$.

title: Evaluate
text: Evaluate $$12\times3.5$$ to find the distance in miles. What is the distance?
